title: creami coconut raspberry ice cream
instructions: Blend all ingredients except raspberries to evenly mix in the sugar.
Pour into a container and freeze for 24 hours.
Process using the "Lite Ice Cream" setting.
If still crumbly, perform one re-spin until smooth enough to make a tunnel for toppings.
Open a 1â€“1.5 inch hole down to the bottom and fill with frozen raspberries.
